did.abstract: 85 plans, elevations, sections, details and schedules on 5 sheets of a housing project for the Naval Air Station in Astoria, Oregon, scale: 1/4" : 1' to 1:1, 1942. Van Evera Bailey (1903-1980) was a Portland architect best known for his residential design work.

bioghist.p: Van Evera Bailey (1903-1980) was a Portland architect best known for his residential design work.

scopecontent.p: 85 plans, elevations, sections, details and schedules on 5 sheets of a housing project for the Naval Air Station in Astoria, Oregon, scale: 1/4" : 1' to 1:1, 1942. Carried out under the auspices of the Federal Public Housing Authority (U.S. National Housing Agency)

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open to the public.

userestrict.p: The Oregon Historical Society is the owner of the materials in the Research Library and makes available reproductions for research, publication, and other uses. Written permission must be obtained from the Research Library prior to any use of reproductions. The Society does not necessarily hold copyright to all the materials in the collections. In some cases, permission for use of reproductions may require seeking additional authorization from the copyright holders.

prefercite.p: Defense Housing Project Plans, Mss 3128, Oregon Historical Society Research Library.

separatedmaterial.p: Van Evera Bailey architectural photographs collection, Org. Lot 100, Oregon Historical Society Research Library,Portland, Or.

relatedmaterial.p: Van Evera Bailey architectural photographs collection, Org. Lot 100, Oregon Historical Society Research Library,Portland, Or.
